lyrics:
6 contributorstranslationsportuguêsthe devil’s tears lyricsverse 1 angus stone
he said i am the devil boy
come with me and well make many storms
he offered me the universe
but inside my heart theres a picture of a girl

prechorus angus  julia stone
some call love a curse some call love a thief
shes my home
and shes as much apart for this broken heart
but see broken bones always seem to mend

chorus angus  julia
ill taste the devils tears
drink from his soul but ill never give up you
ill taste the devils tears
drink from his soul but ill never give up you

verse 2 angus
he said i am the devil boy
come with me and well break many laws
he offered me eternal life
but inside my heart theres a picture of a girl

prechorus angus  julia
some call love a word some call love a thief
but shes my home
and shes as much apart for this broken heart
but see broken bones always seem to mend
